column4: just did a update-manager -d and notice that 11.04 is available.  Is it adviseable to download yet?
It's not really ready full of bugs,  but it also depends on what you plan to do with it.  also you might be lucky with your hardware with it
Ubuntu is my day-to-day machine, and have now managed to transition my kids onto it...so I better not mess with it until it's ready
